sourcesContent:
<template>
  DashBoard
</template>

<script>
export default {
  created() {
    const token = document.cookie.replace(
      /(?:(?:^|.*;\s*)hexToken\s*\=\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$/,
      '$1',
    );

    const api = `${process.env.VUE_APP_API}api/user/check`;
    this.$http.defaults.headers.common.Authorization = token;
    this.$http.post(api, this.user)
      .then((res) => {
        console.log(res);
        if (!res.data.success){
          this.$router.push('')
        }
      });
  },
};
</script>
